Title: Asano
Plot: Logan beaks Omega Red's hold on him and their fight drags onto the street. Elsewhere, Shingen takes Mariko to Madripoor in a private jet. Yukio throws her ring blade at Omega Red and Logan uses it to sever Omega Red's right arm and slices the box on his chest, defeating him. Logan learns that Mariko is to leave for Madripoor soon so he pulls out a beacon with the X-Men insignia. As Logan and Yukio head to the Yashida house, A.I.M. takes Omega Red, still alive, back to a secret base in a stealth
GuestStars: Rikiya Koyama, Romi Park, Fumiko Orikasa, Hidekatsu Shibata, Kazuki Yao, Masato Hagiwara, Masaki Terasoma, Ry?zabur? ?tomo, Toshiyuki Morikawa
